content: I seem to recall that there was a PDF tutorial describing the rewrite method, does anyone know where it lives?
Only thing I found is the paper describing the subterm selection part of the tactic, but I guess that's not what you were looking for
Mm yeah I found that too, but somehow I have this memory of reading an actual tutorial for rewrite. Thanks though! :)

Kevin Kappelmann said:

Only thing I found is the paper describing the subterm selection part of the tactic, but I guess that's not what you were looking for

Yes, I think this is the only source.
